categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of DarkStryder's Fortress was a ground battle fought on the planet Kathol in 8 ABY. The engagement was fought between members of the crew of the New Republic vessel FarStar and their native allies, against the DarkStryder and its minions, supported by Imperial forces loyal to Moff Kentor Sarne. The New Republic forces and their allies won the battle, ending the threat of the DarkStryder and eliminating the rogue warlord Moff Sarne.
